definition: agricultural plastic, used largely for creating greenhouses

sentences.english: A new light conversion agriculture film was prepared.
sentences.chinese: 研製出既轉紫光又轉綠光的新型高光能農膜。

sentences.english: Bubbles are formed easily during the producing of functional agricultural film.
sentences.chinese: 在功能性農膜生產過程中，膜內容易形成氣泡。

sentences.english: A method for the spectra analysis of light-conversion farm film(LCFF) has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了轉光農膜的熒光光譜分析方法。
